column5: Today we got into a good bunch of crappie, took 3 home to try (my first time), I'm going to fry some but with the scrap I'd like to make some sort of stew, does anyone have a good recipe? Thanks!  PS, don't worry, report to come
I was thinking it was a perfect day for panfish Chris. Just 3 though? That's barely an appetizer!
Lol, we got a lot more than that, wasn't sure if I'd like them so this is just to try.
oh you gonna like them...they're as good as perch, some people say they're better. I usually do fillet and deep fry them
